Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Invoice of an Order
    Author:
    wongwanting

    • Constructor Summary

      Invoice(int id, Order order, double tax, double svcChrg, double subTotal, double grandTotal)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Invoice

        public Invoice(int id,
               Order order,
               double tax,
               double svcChrg,
               double subTotal,
               double grandTotal)
        Creates a new invoice with the given id, order, tax, svcChrg, subTotal and grandTotal
        Parameters:
        id - This is the Invoice's id
        order - This is the Order of the Invoice
        tax - This is the tax charged on the Invoice
        svcChrg - This is the svcChrg charged on the Invoice
        subTotal - This is the subTotal charged on the Invoice
        grandTotal - This is the grandTotal charged on the Invoice
